info.title: NewsWhip API
info.description: Our API partners get complete access to our rankings in a machine-readable format (JSON, RSS), with the option of using country, city, topic and time filters for a deeper dive into the 200,000 new pieces of content we track every day.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: Filters articles published in that city. See available cities below. i.e. London, New%20York,%20NY, Toronto

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: One of the following: [default, fb_likes, fb_shares, fb_comments, fb_total, twitter, linkedin, fb_tw_and_li, nw_score, nw_max_score]. Defaults to default

parameters.name: time_period
parameters.description: Filters articles published within the last X hours. X can be 1, 3, 12, 24 or 168 hours)

parameters.name: video_only
parameters.description: true or false. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: publisher
parameters.description: Returns all articles published within that domain or subdomain.

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: One of the following: [default, fb_likes, fb_shares, fb_comments, fb_total, twitter, linkedin, fb_tw_and_li, nw_score, nw_max_score]. Defaults to default

parameters.name: time_period
parameters.description: Filters articles published within the last X hours. X can be 1, 3, 12, 24 or 168 hours)

parameters.name: video_only
parameters.description: true or false. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: One of the following: [default, fb_likes, fb_shares, fb_comments, fb_total, twitter, linkedin, fb_tw_and_li, nw_score, nw_max_score]. Defaults to default

parameters.name: time_period
parameters.description: Filters articles published within the last X hours. X can be 1, 3, 12, 24 or 168 hours)

parameters.name: video_only
parameters.description: true or false. Defaults to false.

properties.description: Keywords assigned by the articleu2019s author

1.description: Flag to designate u201ctimelessu201d articles, always topically relevant

3.description: Earliest date article can be published (default sort)

5.description: Date the article was last updated

6.description: Type of content embodied by the article

7.description: Phase of exporting that a business should be in to benefit from the article

8.description: Industry category assigned to this article

11.description: Trade region covered by an articleu2019s content

12.description: World region covered by an articleu2019s content

13.description: Would sub-region covered by an articleu2019s content

14.description: Country covered by an articleu2019s content

15.description: Keywords assigned by the articleu2019s author
